pl.polsl.java.proj1.view

Class UserInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.polsl.java.proj1.view.UserInterface

  • public final class UserInterface
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for getting input data and displaying all communicates. All interaction with user is done there.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    MarczykLAP

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  UserInterface.Language
      Available languages of the interface.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private FermatTest fermatTest
      Part of the application model.
      private UserInterface.Language language
      Specifies the current language of menu.
      private LanguageImplementer languageImplementer
      Reference to the implementer of the bridge-pattern.
      private java.io.BufferedReader terminalReader
      Is used to perform readline() function to obtain the input data from the user.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UserInterface()
      Non-parametric constructor.

    • Field Detail

      • language

        private UserInterface.Language language
        Specifies the current language of menu.

      • languageImplementer

        private LanguageImplementer languageImplementer
        Reference to the implementer of the bridge-pattern.

      • terminalReader

        private final java.io.BufferedReader terminalReader
        Is used to perform readline() function to obtain the input data from the user.

      • fermatTest

        private FermatTest fermatTest
        Part of the application model. FermatTest class is used to calculate primality of a number.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UserInterface

        public UserInterface()
        Non-parametric constructor. Sets the default options.

    • Method Detail

      • setLanguage

        public void setLanguage(java.lang.String langToSet)
        Sets interface to different language.
        Parameters:
        langToSet - language that has to be set. Must be equal to one of enum "Language" fields.

      • setImplementer

        private void setImplementer()
        Sets implementer to proper state using current value of enum Language field.

      • menuService

        public boolean menuService()
        Prints the menu and all communicates and asks user for data. Also performs proper action that user wanted to take.
        Returns:
        True - if exit wasn't chosen. False - if exit was chosen.

      • performFermatTest

        public void performFermatTest()
        Performs Fermat's test. Firstly asks for the number which primality has to be tested, then asks for the reference value required to perform the test. User can choose if he wants to put the value by himself whether the program has to do it for him.

      • msgExceptionArrayIndexOutOfBounds

        public void msgExceptionArrayIndexOutOfBounds()
        Procedure displays message in specified by UserInterface language which informs about ArrayIndexOutOfBoundException. Message has to be public in order to execute in the main method while checking if startup arguments are correct.

      • msgInitializationFinished

        public void msgInitializationFinished()
        Procedure displays message in specified by UserInterface language which informs about finishing the initialization of startup options. Message has to be public in order to execute in the main method while checking if startup arguments are correct.
